---
title: "Kale Salad <br> 羽衣甘蓝沙拉"
categories: [Vegetable]
image: ./Images/kale-salad.jpg
---

### 🥣 Ingredients | 用料

| Ingredient | 用料 | Amount | 份量 |
|------------|------|--------|------|
| Sweet potato | 红薯 | 1 large | 一个 |
| Kale | 羽衣甘蓝 | 3–4 stalks | 3–4根 |
| Cooked chicken | 熟鸡肉 | 200 g | 200克 |
| Apple | 苹果 | 1 | 一个 |
| Grape tomatoes | 圣女果 | 8 pieces | 8个 |
| Goat cheese | 山羊奶酪 | 20 g | 20克 |
| Balsamic vinegar | 意大利香醋 | To taste | 适量 |
| Olive oil | 橄榄油 | To taste | 适量 |
| Salt and pepper | 盐和黑胡椒 | To taste | 适量 |

### 🍴 Steps | 步骤
1. Preheat the oven to 200°C.  
 将烤箱预热至200°C。
2. Wash and cut the sweet potato in half lengthwise, then slice thinly.  
 将红薯洗净，纵向切半，再切成薄片。
3. Place sweet potato slices on a baking sheet, spray with oil, and season with salt and pepper. Roast for 40 minutes.  
 将红薯片放入烤盘，喷油，加盐和黑胡椒调味，烘烤40分钟。
4. Wash the kale, remove stems, and chop the leaves into bite-sized pieces.  
 羽衣甘蓝洗净去茎，切成小块。
5. Chop apple, grape tomatoes, and cooked chicken into bite-sized pieces.  
 将苹果、圣女果和熟鸡肉切块。
6. Combine kale, chicken, apple, grape tomatoes, and goat cheese in a bowl.  
 将羽衣甘蓝、鸡肉、苹果、圣女果和山羊奶酪放入碗中。
7. Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and olive oil. Toss to combine and serve.  
 淋上香醋和橄榄油，搅拌均匀即可食用。
